actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to require that new forms and reports, and revisions of existing forms, resulting from legislation be contained in reports of committees reporting the legislation.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1970 to require any public bill or joint resolution reported by a Senate or House of Representatives committee (other than the Committee on Appropriations of either House) to contain any new forms and reports, and revisions of existing forms required by the enactment of such bill or joint resolution, or a statement of reasons why the enactment of such legislation would not result in any new forms or reports or any revisions of existing forms.

titles.title: A bill to require that new forms and reports, and revisions of existing forms, resulting from legislation be contained in reports of committees reporting the legislation.
